transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji sir. 
Executive: Yah Shree Krishna company se baat kar rahe ho bhai? 
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir, main Rishi Aggarwal bol raha hu manager IndiaMART se. 
Customer: Haan ji boliye sir. 
Executive: Aapna parso bhi discussion hua tha buylead ko leke sir jo aapne. 
Customer: Haan bilkul bilkul haan ji haan ji yes yes I remember. 
Executive: Haan. 
Executive: Main puch raha tha ki sir abhi toh aap buylead consume kar rahe ho abhi toh aa rahi hai leads aapke paas sir? 
Customer: Nahi sir aa rahi hai kal bhi chali gayi aaj se. 
Executive: Toh kal kya ho gaya? 
Customer: Maine kal bola tha haan kal bhi ek 50 ki aayi thi ek 60 ki aayi thi nikal gayi woh sold out dikha raha hai system pe. 
Customer: Jitni thi woh clear nahi na hota sold out publish hona lag gaya. 
Executive: Isme yahi hai na jo ek lead paanch logo ka hi hai na isliye woh print. 
Customer: Sir phir hamari service band kar do na sir hum paanch logo mein nahi aate toh band kar do phir aur kya ho sakta hai phir. 
Executive: Sir uske liye bas band wali baat nahi hai baat yeh hai ki thoda sa active jyada rehna padega aur koi reason nahi hai. 
Customer: Sir active main baat suniye main apni aankhe is mobile mein ya system mein daal du? 
Executive: Batao mujhe. 
Executive: Aap mobile se aap mobile se use karte hai desktop se karte hai use? 
Customer: Mobile se bhi mobile se maximum 99% mobile se karta hu. 
Executive: 99% mobile se karte ho? 
Customer: Haan. 
Customer: Ab mere saamne system mein matlab mobile khola hua hai. 
Customer: Thik hai ji phir lead check kar raha hu main usko. 
Customer: Usme dobara past mein jaata hu toh yeh nahi ek second pehle ek minute pehle jab mere system pe aati hai toh woh sold out hoti hai. 
Customer: Mere paas aayegi toh main accept hogi toh main usko purchase karunga na. 
Executive: Yeh LED flood light ki requirement hi bahut jyada aa rahi hai sir. 
Customer: Sir wohi toh hame toh jisme kaam mein profit hai. 
Executive: Aur sir Punjab ki aur 90% jo leads aa rahi hai woh Punjab Haryana se aa rahi hai. 
Customer: Sir hame sir hame toh sir service isliye li hai na. 
Executive: Bilkul. 
Customer: Agar hame service ka koi matlab itna benefit nahi hai toh hame kya fayda hai matlab phir toh hum apna usko jo salesman hai wohi rakh lenge. 
Customer: Salesman ko salary de denge aapko phir kyun service leni hai aapki. 
Customer: Yeh cheez hai. 
Customer: Dekho usko aapne do teen ka time diya tha ab waisa hi ho raha hai. 
Executive: Ya phir sir aap yeh kya naam hai jo mobile app hai woh aap ek phone mein aur aap install kar lijiye agar jaise ki agar aap kabhi late ho jaate ho toh kam se kam woh dusra wala. 
Customer: Late hi nahi hota na baat yeh hai na baat mein late hounga tabhi na late hota hi nahi main. 
Customer: Main toh mera mera kaam kya hai yahi toh kaam hai mera aur main yahi nahi kaam kar sakta toh main late hota hi nahi. 
Customer: Mera kaam subah uthne se pehle baki sara kuch baad mein check karta hu pehle aapka app kholta hu. 
Customer: Haan dekho aaya dekho 23 minute pehle aayi thi maine uss time check kar li mere paas aa gayi. 
Customer: Thik hai uska phir unfortuntely uska phone number hi aapne galat mention kiya hua hai. 
Executive: Aise bhi leads mere paas bhi aati hai jiska phone uska phone number hi nahi hai. 
Customer: Jiska phone number hi nahi hai. 
Executive: Email ID padi hai email ID hai usme email ID. 
Customer: Haan bilkul padi hai. 
Executive: Woh dono mein se ek cheez waise mobile number bahut rare hota hai ki na ho. 
Customer: Woh aise hai na ji sir email mein koi nahi check karta. 
Customer: Chalo woh aapka issue nahi hai uss time sunne mein thodi si ek do digit idhar udhar ho jaata hai woh koi problem nahi hai chalo. 
Customer: Matlab lead toh mere paas nahi aayi toh woh kisi ke mere se baat nahi hoti toh kisi se baat nahi hogi dobara usko woh check karega. 
Executive: Nahi sir aise hi baat nahi hai ki sari lead left ho jayengi matlab thodi bahut lead nahi hogi requirement bahut aa rahi hai bike ki isme. 
Customer: Sir main pata kya baat hai jo meri service hai na main apni service ki baat kar raha hu jo meri service ki leads hai na jo mujhe chahiye woh sold out hoti hai. 
Customer: Maine 10 20 ko kya karna hai. 
Executive: Nahi main yeh keh raha hu ki jitni bhi lead aapke paas aa rahi hai jo sold out ho rahi hai main keh raha hu sari toh sold out nahi hoti kuch toh lead. 
Customer: Sabhi left ho rahi hai sabhi sabhi sabhi sabhi ho rahi hai. 
Customer: Jo mere mere jo mere pattern mein hai na woh ho rahi hai. 
Customer: Main toh aapke paas LED flood light ki aa rahi hai LED ki aa rahi hai. 
Customer: Haan LED flood lights ki aa rahi hai aur main usko. 
Executive: Haan haan haan. 
Customer: Toh usko main bolta hu bhi I am interested woh bas thanks for your feedback uske baad phir wohi problem woh sold out. 
Executive: Aur yeh jo bhi aapne consume kari hai usme se kuch bana? 
Customer: Sir woh toh waise hi consume kar raha hu main usme toh abhi tak mere paas ek lead mature hui hai. 
Customer: Do lead mature hui hai ek toh retail ki hai thik hai ek wholesale ki hai bas. 
Executive: Accha abhi tak. 
Customer: Ek mahina ho gaya service liye ko toh usme mera business pata kitna hua hai mera business pata 13000 ka business hua usme. 
Executive: Accha. 
Executive: 13000 mein humko bolte hai ki chaar chaar paanch paanch mahine ho gaye hamari deal mature nahi hai sir ek mahine mein phir bhi matlab aisa nahi hai ki response nahi hame aa raha sir matlab aa toh raha hai aisi toh baat nahi hai sir. 
Customer: Bhai sahab ek mahine mein 13000 ka business hai thik hai usme profit hame 1300 hai aapko kitna diya hai humne. 
Customer: First impression is last impression agar first impression hi aisa hai toh baad mein kya banega iska. 
Executive: Abhi naye naye aapne account. 
Customer: Teen mahine mein agar hamare hamari hum company act mein hai na company act mein teen mahine se koi bhi aap gaadi lo koi bhi kuch cheez lo koi service lo teen mahine tak aap satisfied nahi ho toh aapko uske refund karna padega. 
Customer: Agar teen mahine nikal jaate hai phir aapki matlab koi nahi hai sunwai nahi hai. 
Customer: Koi legal koi action nahi le sakte. 
Customer: Sir business to band kar sakte ho main aapko yahi bol raha hu ki mere se ek mahina nikal gaya dusra mahina start ho raha hai ya aap meri problem solve kar do majburan mujhe consumer court ka darwaza khadkana padega. 
Customer: Kyunki main toh consumer hu na. 
Executive: Hmm hmm. 
Customer: Woh aapko bhi pareshani hai mere ko pareshani hai mere ko pareshani nahi hai kyunki main apne headquarter mein baitha hu aapko pareshani hai aap dur se aaoge. 
Customer: Chahe apna lawyer aaye chahe kuch bhi aaye uska bhi toh kharcha padna hi hai na sarkari ko. 
Customer: Toh aapko yeh confirm hai ki band karwani hai service aapko? 
Customer: Sir mujhe aaj hi de do main band karwaunga meri problem solve kar do toh mujhe kya jarurat hai band karne ki. 
Executive: Sir dekho woh toh yeh hai ki sir aapko matlab hyperactive rehna padega. 
Customer: Haan nahi nahi phir aap meri service service band kar do GST card ke mujhe refund kar do bas main aapko GST ka claim bhi nahi karta bhi mujhe GST bhi chahiye. 
Executive: Thik hai main ek baar baat kar leta hu is cheez ko leke ek second line pe rahenge aap main aapki baat apne sir se karwa du agar woh free hai toh. 
Customer: Haan sir tasalli se baat kar lijiye uske baad mujhe call kar lijiye. 
Executive: Thik hai main hai na ek kaam karta hu woh shayad kisi video meeting pe ja rahe hai thik hai. 
Customer: Haan koi baat nahi aap aaram se baat kar lijiye aapke paas time hai main yeh nahi keh raha mujhe abhi decision dijiye mujhe koi baat nahi hai ek do din Monday tak Tuesday tak aap decision le lijiye aaram se aap apne lawyer se bhi baat kar lijiye. 
Executive: Nahi nahi main apne senior se baat kar raha hu. 
Customer: Main jo act ki baat kar raha hu woh main ho sakta hai main galat hu mujhe pata hai na company act hai. 
Customer: Quarter mein teen mahine se pehle pehle aap kisi gaadi bhi check nahi kar sakte ho aap. 
Executive: Koi nahi. 
Customer: Agar usme kuch problem usme problem agar sahi problem hai toh agar problem nahi hai phir nahi hai mere ko problem hai main dikha sakta hu. 
Executive: Koi nahi sir main apne senior se ek ghante mein aapko call back karwa deta hu aap yeh wala feedback unko bhi ek baar bata dena bas thik hai sir taki woh aage process karwa sake sir. 
Customer: Okay hai okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads showing as sold out immediately.

- Most leads are from Punjab and Haryana.

- Dissatisfied with the service and business generated.

- Wants refund if the issue is not resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive will discuss the issue with his senior.

- Executive will call back in an hour.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back in an hour.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, sold out
